targets.expr: sum by(container, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster",namespace="$Namespace", container!="", image!="", container!="POD"})/sum by(container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster",resource="memory", namespace="$Namespace"})>0.85

sum by (container, pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster",image!="", namespace="$Namespace"}[2m]))/sum by(container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster",resource="cpu", namespace="$Namespace"})> 0.85

sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace"}[2m]))/sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", unit="core", resource="cpu"}) or on() vector(0)

sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace"}[2m]))/sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", unit="core", resource="cpu"}) or on() vector(0)
sum(sum(kube_node_status_capacity{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", resource="cpu"}) by (node) + sum(kube_node_spec_unschedulable{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"}==0) by(node)) or on() vector(0)

count(kube_pod_status_ready{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", condition="false", namespace="$Namespace"}==1) by(namespace) - (count(kube_pod_status_phase{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", phase="Succeeded", namespace="$Namespace"}==1) by(namespace) or vector(0)) or count(kube_pod_status_ready{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", condition="false", namespace="$Namespace"}==1) by(namespace)

count(sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"}) by (deployment)<sum(kube_deployment_spec_replicas{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"}) by (deployment)) or on() vector(0)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace"})/sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", unit="byte", resource="memory"}) or on() vector(0)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace"})/sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", unit="byte", resource="memory"}) or on() vector(0)
sum(sum(kube_node_status_capacity{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", resource="memory"}) by (node) + sum(kube_node_spec_unschedulable{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"}==0) by(node)) or on() vector(0)

sum(sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"}) and group by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kube_persistentvolumeclaim_status_phase{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", phase="Bound", namespace="$Namespace"} == 1)) or on() vector(0)
group by (image, container, container_id, pod) (kube_pod_container_info{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"})

group by (container, container_id, pod) (kube_pod_container_info{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"}) * on(container,pod) group_left() max by (container,pod)(kube_pod_container_status_running{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"})

group by (container, container_id, pod) (kube_pod_container_info{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"}) * on(container,pod) group_left() max by (container,pod)(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"})

group by (container, container_id, pod) (kube_pod_container_info{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"}) * on(container,pod) group_left() max(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace",container!="",container!="POD"}[1m])) by (pod,container)

group by (container, container_id, pod) (kube_pod_container_info{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"}) * on(container,pod) group_left() (max(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", container!="",container!="POD",namespace="$Namespace"}[1m])) by (container,pod) / (max(container_spec_cpu_quota{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", container!="",container!="POD",namespace=~"$Namespace"}/100000 > 0) by (container,pod)))

group by (container, container_id, pod) (kube_pod_container_info{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"}) * on(container,pod) group_left() sum by (container,pod)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"})

group by (container, container_id, pod) (kube_pod_container_info{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"}) * on(container,pod) group_left() (max(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", container!="",container!="POD",namespace="$Namespace"}[1m])) by (container,pod) / (max by (container,pod)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"})))

group by (container, container_id, pod) (kube_pod_container_info{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"}) * on(container,pod) group_left() sum by (container,pod)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", resource="cpu",namespace="$Namespace"})

group by (container, container_id, pod) (kube_pod_container_info{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"}) * on(container,pod) group_left() max(container_memory_working_set_bytes{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", container !="",container!="POD",namespace=~"$Namespace"}) by (pod,container)

group by (container, container_id, pod) (kube_pod_container_info{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"}) * on(container,pod) group_left() (max(container_memory_working_set_bytes{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", container!="",container!="POD",namespace=~"$Namespace"}) by (pod,container) / max(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", container !="",container!="POD",namespace=~"$Namespace"}) by (pod, container) < 1)

group by (container, container_id, pod) (kube_pod_container_info{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"}) * on(container,pod) group_left() sum by (container,pod)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"})

group by (container, container_id, pod) (kube_pod_container_info{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"}) * on(container,pod) group_left() (max(container_memory_working_set_bytes{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", container !="",container!="POD",namespace=~"$Namespace"}) by (pod,container) / max by (container,pod)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"}))

group by (container, container_id, pod) (kube_pod_container_info{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace"}) * on(container,pod) group_left() sum by (container,pod)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster", resource="memory",namespace="$Namespace"})
